WidgetInfo.Description: A key map to locate the vewing area of the primary map
WidgetInfo.Label: Overview map
WidgetInfo.Tooltip: Click and drag to recenter the map

Parameter.Name: MapId
Parameter.Description: The ID of a map from the fusion MapSet to use as the map image. If this parameter is missing, the main map will be re-used.
Parameter.Label: MapId

Parameter.Name: MinRatio
Parameter.Description: The ratio of the overview map resolution to the main map resolution at which to zoom farther out on the overview map.
Parameter.Label: Minimum ratio

Parameter.Name: MaxRatio
Parameter.Description: The ratio of the overview map resolution to the main map resolution at which to zoom farther in on the overview map.
Parameter.Label: Maximum ratio
